oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Photograph of the Warner Children, circa 1895
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A photograph of Sadie, Mary Louise and Margaret, the daughters of Percy and Margaret Lindsley Warner, blowing soap bubbles with their friends. The photograph was probably taken at the Warner home at 125 North Spruce Street, now the southwest corner of Eighth Avenue and Commerce Street. Individuals represented in the image include: Margaret Warner, Thomas Kaeling, Lula Mai Raulsin, Sadie Warner, Lillian Davidson, Porter Raulsin, Jennie Louise Davidson, Martha Thomas, Elizabeth Davidson, Mrs. McConnell, Charles Davidson, and Mary Louise Warner. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
